lenders.name: Melting Pot Invstmt Club
lenders.loan_because: We loan to help people who are in need.   As an investment club, helping others is one of our goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Our group is very diversified - consisting of members of many cultural backgrounds and varying occupations - including nursing, social work, real estate, teaching and accounting

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I support those that help themselves through their responsibility and hard work.  Kiva is such a wonderful organization for this kind of help.  Kiva's clients should be immensely proud of themselves.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help people in need in a practical  way.

lenders.name: Morgan Roderick
lenders.loan_because: I believe that in the long run, people know best how to help themselves, and should be given the opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing people with opportunities to make a difference in their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a small high school in the Dallas area for children who are in recovery from drug and/or alcohol addiction.

lenders.name: scott
lenders.loan_because: its fun
lenders.occupational_info: sales

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone less fortunate a chance to better themselves for themselves  & their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am disable and reitred so I know how it is to live on very little but enough that I can help the people of Kiva who live on basically nothing. I feel it is my duty to help these people help themselves.

lenders.name: Shiikhanur
lenders.loan_because: I do it because I seem to think in the shoes of the Loaner not as the lender a humane service to good and to humanity
lenders.occupational_info: id love to do more

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have come to learn that small business and innovation are some of the best tools to overcome poverty

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: It's helping others and giving back

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because:
"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world."  ~Anne Frank~

"I am only one, but I am one.  I cannot do everything, but I can do something.  And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do."  ~Edward Everett Hale~

"What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.” ~Albert Pike~

lenders.name: Jana
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have had lots of people help me be successful and I want to "pay it forward".  I am very excited to be part of this community of generous people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Chief Sales Officer for a financial consulting firm.  I design stragegies for growth and through my employees expand our ability to serve clients.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I received help to become a nurse and now I want to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a nurse who did hospice work, helping dying patients and their families

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: microloans to the most deserving is capitalism in its finest hour; it's the right thing to do and in one small way makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist in ongoing training for global telecommunications support specialists, who then work on call centers around the world, keeping the call center telecom infrastructure up and running.

lenders.name: Neel Mehta & Family
lenders.loan_because: micro-finance loans help people become self-sufficient. Every bit counts. Please help out, if you can.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with more than enough in my life and want to share what I can with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a global bank and manage technology projects for them.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: Kiva enables me to.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because:
I know how critical a loan can be for anyone wanting to improve their lives, their communities and thereby the world.
I primarily invest in Farming and food-related activities as I used to be a farmer and seller of vegetables at farmers markets, and I know how it is never-ending work for little money, but very rewarding in many other ways, deeply educational, and a critical glue for rural communities.
I have been without access to money at various times in my life; I realize how fortunate I am, and would prefer to invest in people and communities rather than corporations or other non-human "persons".
lenders.occupational_info:
I research, develop and sell Electric Vehicles.
I build and repair radiation detection equipment so individuals may protect and educate themselves.
I'm helping to develop an educational service for radiation testing of locally harvested food and seafood for individuals.

lenders.name: Friends
lenders.loan_because:
being able to give is a gift.  

"If you have two shirts, give one to the poor. If you have food, share it with those who are hungry." - this is a very simple way of our humble attempt to do this.

lenders.name: Brendon and Hilary
lenders.loan_because: To help break the cycle of Poverty which often breeds ignorance and resentment - fertile ground for treading the path to the Dark Side.  And everyone should be as happy as they choose to be.
lenders.occupational_info: Healthcare

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: In Jesus' name, I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a home for the elderly.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I started our own retail business from scratch almost 25 years ago with no employees and without the help of a bank.  It was very hard work but very rewarding. We now have a larger business and 10 employees. Now that we have a successful retail business, I feel like we should return the favor to help other small business get started.
lenders.occupational_info: Every day I encourage my employees to do the best job possible helping customers to meet their needs.  I spend most of my time training them in understanding the product they sell and encouraging great customer service.  I keep constant track of my finances and try to understand good business principals of inventory turn and profit margins.  If the business is not making a profit...there is no business.  Managing people and maintaining good financial business practices takes a lot of passion, discipline and time.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: my small gesture makes a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and want to pass along to others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a dental office and help people keep their teeth healthy.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I've read too many articles and books about how the US has exploited developing countries through unpayable ecomonic deals and I want to be a part of the change to that perception
lenders.occupational_info: I build out work spaces for businesses: corporate, technology firms, entertainment houses, etc; working with designers and contractors to take the idea of a space through realization

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: God has given so much to me.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is right, and fair, and just, to share.

lenders.name: Wes
lenders.loan_because: We have to invest in those trying to better themselves individually if we want a better world for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: work for a corporation

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: Leave the world better than when you came in.

lenders.name: Sofie
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for, I want to help other people who do not have so much.
lenders.occupational_info:
My friend and I do a job called "mother's helper". We babysit, take care of animals and plants, and help clean up our local lake.  
I love to dance and sing.

lenders.name: Mdote
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe we are in this together. I am a first generation refugee and I am a business owner so I know their struggles trying simply to live and to make a living.

lenders.name: Glaucia & Paul
lenders.loan_because: Once we learnt about Kiva, and how easy it is to support a small business anywhere in the world, doing nothing was not an option!  And we like the connection it provides between us and the entrepreneur, anywhere in the world - a world without borders.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in management of a major utility in Perth, and Paul works in mining.

lenders.name: Breianne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the world heal poverty issues.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide a variety of holistic healing techniques to heal the body, mind and soul.

lenders.name: Frederick
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I need to pass it on!!

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business major at Harding University graduating in May

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: We respond and treat people who need medical help and transport them to a hospital.

lenders.name: Boris
lenders.loan_because: entrepreneurs with limited resources inspire me. I am also credit to team.

lenders.name: Liana
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to build a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in Japan.

lenders.name: Mandi
lenders.loan_because: every one needs a helping hand every once in a while.  When we can help those in need the world shines a little brighter.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping secondary school students work on their homework to acheive their goals and graduate.

lenders.name: John Cornett
lenders.loan_because: we are all one

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I will no longer fund Kiva loans due to the fact that Kiva actively supports extreme animal cruelty by continuing to grant loans to those who profit from bloodsports.

lenders.name: Illonne
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: A traditional housewife. It is more satisfying to see someone succeed because of my small contribution

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can, I will and I must.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that people get what they pay for and pay for what they get.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: having travelled widely, I have seen many countries where our donations can really make a positive impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, helping sick people with their diet and nutrition.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with so much, and want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world - I am a teacher.

lenders.name: Madhu
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life.

lenders.name: Lui
lenders.loan_because: I feel that every person in this world should be given a chance to better their life.  These are not people looking for a free hand out but rather mothers and fathers looking to use their knowledge and skill set to provide for their family.  One must exploit their entrepreneural spirt. I will continue to admire and help these business people as much as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I pride myself in working along side my brother fixing houses up and selling them. I also enjoy helping my brother come up with marketing ideas for a product called the Germ Terminator.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in Africa

lenders.name: Chief Mike
lenders.loan_because: Large banking corporations will never be able to provide a "Micro-Finance" service such as this does!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a volunteer in various education projects in the Philippines (esp. OLPC-Philippines, Farmer's field school, KVFMPC (A market vender's and small farmer's micro finance cooperative), Kalibo Public Elementary School II/Aklan Special Education Center.

lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a break. Kiva is amazing.

Founder and CEO of Mindpark AB.
Senior advisor in all things internet and media. Old, new, digital. Some call me a social media therapist. CEO whisperer.
Business angel and investor in early stage tech startups.
I write, lecture, speak, facilitate and moderate large and small groups.

lenders.name: Monika
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help those who are unfortunate.

I study the heritage, i.e. monuments, houses or farms in a rural region.

lenders.occupational_info:
I build houses 
, to a standard that is probably different to many parts of the world.

lenders.name: Ewa
lenders.loan_because: These people simply need it

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have an obligation to care for the less fortunate among us. I see this as a chance to help lift someone up from poverty, to make a direct and real impact on their lives. I have been fortunate in my life - now I can give back in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a custodian in a local high school.

lenders.name: Keri
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to dance.

lenders.name: Jeanette & Robert
lenders.loan_because:
An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity. 
- Martin Luther King, Jr.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a software entrepreneur from New Zealand. I help create technology that help people communicate.

lenders.occupational_info: I help executive and business owners clearly communicate their unique skills for business success.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Inorder to fund the account
lenders.occupational_info: Kind of foreign exchange online.

I am an Aircraft Maintenance Engineer. 
I love my job. It is very physical, technical and challenging. I am a woman in a mans world, and am proof that anything is possible, if given the opportunity.

lenders.name: philippe
lenders.loan_because: I can help, and I see through my extensive travelling ( for my job) that there is a big need

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do.
I want to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Deeply religious retired physician.

lenders.name: Nkat
lenders.loan_because: I think some of the stuff that is done with the loans is pretty cool.
lenders.occupational_info: stuff of the beehive

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in not being indifferent. I believe in people. I believe in our collective strenght to do right by each other.

lenders.name: the Lewis girls
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to learn about being part of a larger world.
lenders.occupational_info: Business owner and stay-at-home Mom.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I've had my own art business for almost 40  years here in California and always appreciated any help I received from other people. I wanted to do something for someone else who has their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: For my art business, I paint with watercolors and have sold my artwork for 40 years. I have had a part time job for 4 years making signs and art for Trader Joe's.

lenders.name: Russ
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to live in a place with ample opportunity. I believe in sharing some of that good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses improve their profitability and worker satisfaction.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Since I retired from teaching after 20 years, my husband and I have our own financial planning company.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.occupation: Consultant to Nonprofit and Public Organizations
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is doing great work and with a relatively small investment I am able to pool with a larger group of people and effect change somewhere on the planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a consultant to nonprofit and public organizations specializing in management restructuring, leadership development, strategic planning, evaluation, and new program development. I live in Desert Hot Springs, CA and Joshua Tree, CA.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to be able to help people around the world. It's more personal than supporting a large organization and not really knowing where your money goes.  It's a really cool idea and also fun!

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because: Through Kiva I can be a part of the empowerment of women in poor communities, promoting gender-equity.

lenders.name: David T
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of other human being's ambitions and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to find work that I enjoy doing, working with people to achieve common goals with a balance of living life.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of junior project managers in the development of websites and Internet media campaigns (emails, ad banners, etc.) for Fortune 100 companies.

lenders.name: Scot
lenders.loan_because: Supporting hard working people throughout the world is the best form of diplomacy. Helping others is what Americans are all about.
lenders.occupational_info: I build and maintain computer networks that help businesses grow and prosper.

lenders.name: Mara & Bryan
lenders.loan_because: We want to make the world better by encouraging financial independence and self-sufficiency for others.

lenders.name: ECB-3M Canada
lenders.loan_because: We are a team of people who want to help eliminate poverty.  We like KIVA's concept of using micro-financing to help needy entrepreneurs who wish to learn how to earn their way out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Our team is comprised of many skills, genders, cultures, and ages from a variety of job functions including: Marketing, Sales,  Technical Service, Administration, Management, and Customer Service.  Our people are proud to be able to help others in this way, i.e., through KIVA.  Best wishes...

lenders.name: esther&jeff
lenders.loan_because: we made an agreement to use a portion of the sale of esther's sculpture to jeff for loans in perpetuity to entrepreneurs through kiva
lenders.occupational_info: we both work in the finance industry; jeff is also a philanthropist and esther also sculpts

lenders.name: Kristie
lenders.loan_because: It could make a difference in someone's life
lenders.occupational_info: I develop marketing programs for food products, such as coupons, sampling events & newspaper advertisements

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I can...
lenders.occupational_info: Electronic assembly for various customers

lenders.name: Rich Amooi
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to give back and be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I entertain people at wedding celebrations.

lenders.name: Aldo
lenders.loan_because: I remember how difficult it was for me to get a little seed money to help start my projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the creative director in a collective editorial and design think tank. We develop design strategies and editorial packages for young and new artists and media outlets.

lenders.name: Jenney
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is at a university in the United States in the Office of International Education. I assist American students who study abroad at foreign universities, and I also assist foreign students who come to my university to study.

lenders.name: Gita
lenders.loan_because: We have been so blessed by our daughter-- It is a small way I can make the world a better place for Meg to grow up in.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a grade 3 teacher for seven years, which I found to be extremely exciting and fulfilling.  Now as a mother, however, I am so happy to be at home enjoying this time with my precious little girl!

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It is a beautiful, powerful, wonderful thing!

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: it's a small world.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: My fiance is from Guatemala and I know that I can make a contribution to his home country and the people who are trying to sustain their lives and help their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on domestic policy that affects women business owners and the issues that matter most to them like healthcare and other things that affect them and their families.

lenders.name: Donation Jarheads
lenders.loan_because: We put all our loose change into a big mason jar and twice a year, put it to better use.
lenders.occupational_info:
Parents: media industry.
Kids: School.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in poorer parts of the world who are trying to help themselves.

lenders.name: S. F.
lenders.loan_because: I love helping in this manner.
lenders.occupational_info: When a teacher is ill or cannot work for a day, they telephone me and I go in an take their place for that day.  One school has 4 classes daily, the second school has 5 classes daily.

lenders.name: Steve & Clare
lenders.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lenders.name: Bruno
lenders.loan_because: i think i have to share some of my luck in life with those who really need just a small push forward in some very really difficult conditions
lenders.occupational_info: Stressfull but...enjoyable

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform and teach various styles of drums and percussion.

lenders.name: Charu
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people trying to make a living. There is a saying 'If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. If you teach a man how to fish, you feed him for his life'. I hope that all Kiva entrepreneurs will be very successful and create a lot of prosperity for their cities and nations.

lenders.name: Jorge and Carina
lenders.loan_because: my wife and I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Ann-Louise
lenders.occupational_info:
Administrating municipal waste collection in a community with 30 000 inhabitants. 
I work part-time and also take care of my two children.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make the world a little better.

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to better themselves.

lenders.name: José and Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We, from different countries, met travelling many years ago in Japan and have been blessed in our lives. We feel microlending via Kiva is a way we can help empower others and return our blessings in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: José consults with businesses and organisations to help people work together more harmoniously. Barbara is a retired primary school teacher.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: As an Entrepreneur i have a responsibility
lenders.occupational_info: Making a difference

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: D.A.
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace corps volunteer (in Adzopé & Bouaké) in the Ivory Coast  in the '70s & have wonderful memories of my experiences with the people in my 3 years there
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language in France

lenders.name: Jan & Gary
lenders.loan_because: There are a lot of good people who live in  troubled circumstances.  They work hard and struggle to provide life's necessities for their families and strive to make a better life for their children.  It is our privilege to be able to give them a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher / Transportation

lenders.name: Tayyab
lenders.loan_because: Paying it back.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Perry and Laureen
lenders.loan_because: great way to help on a personal level!

lenders.name: Candy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: it's great to help, specially microbusiness

lenders.name: Kate

lenders.name: Paul & Karen
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help people make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.name: Cathy, Josh, Jacob & Maya
lenders.loan_because: We love the ingenius solution Kiva provides to help good people around  the world to improve their lives.  We view participating in Kiva's organization as a priviledge!
lenders.occupational_info: Cathy is a physician and takes care of children with heart disease. I am an anesthesiologist, and I care for adults undergoing heart surgery.

lenders.name: Jerry

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Jeffrey

lenders.occupational_info: Although retired we have started four businesses that not only provide money for travel and home improvement projects but also allows us to stay involved with our local community. lenders.name: James & Carmen

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: I know that I and others like me help to enable people all over the world to improve their quality of life.

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and spend my days taking care of my husband, my daughters and grandchildren and crochet and quilt for charity.

lenders.name: Matthew Kevan McGettigan
lenders.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do.

The cold indifference needed to not try and help people in less wealthy parts of the world would be as bad, to my mind, as if I had caused them to be less wealthy in the first place.

It's better than giving to charity because the money is re-paid and then I can give it again. So the benefits keep multiplying.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a wildlife reserve managing the land for conservation (so lots of wildlife can live there) and helping to educate people about the importance of nature. 

Also, I help people who want to come and visit the park to do so safely and in a way that will not harm the wildlife.

lenders.occupational_info: i am a student hoping to help the world. what i do is get up in the morning, ride the bus to my school sit through nine classes play my favorite sport in the worls, tennis, and then ride the late bus home to my house relax and do it the next day.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone;s life who is not as fortunate as we are.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: As I sit here studying to get my degree in business, I realize that there are people out there, less fortunate than me ready to work, but don't have the money to do so. I have been to some third world countries, and the people are so warm, welcoming, and hard working. The least I can do is loan them so money so they can get going and succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a freshman at an American University.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: kiva is a fantastic idea to help people in other countries
lenders.occupational_info: help people in my country by talking

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the people I'm helping out.

I believe they have the enthusiasm, work ethic, and vision to achieve what they have set out to do, and this is a way I can support their efforts.

lenders.name: Jason Wagner
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lenders.name: clarisse
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to participate in a more just and better world;  because I wish to actively participate in the people happiness, in the people who are fighting for a better life, and the realization of their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work I do many different things: given telephone calls to get customers, make proposals and organize events related adventure activities and nature activities: as rafting, canoeing, Climbing, Rappel, Bodyboard. What I like most in my profession is the contact with people (each person has a different way of thinking) and the possibility of providing moments of leisure and coexistence with nature, allowing a more relaxed and healthy living.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do. I want the world to see that America can be a kind and gernerous country.
lenders.occupational_info: I create stories for movies and tv.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I was given a donation to Kiva and am so glad that this donation will make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: We plan the logistics for meetings and travel incentive programs for corporate accounts worldwide.

lenders.name: Lana
lenders.loan_because:
Our mission here at Uniwolf Services, is to provide jobs that are a much-needed scenario in the state of Michigan. We provide a needed service to the auto industry at a relatively cheap rate. 

Our target is to employ up to five unemployed persons, men and women, a year for at “least” the next five years. Our target is also to save the dealerships as much money as possible, especially with the downfall of the auto industry. 

I feel that within the five years, Uniwolf Services will help with the incline in the unemployment rate by employing the unemployed. I feel that if we here at Uniwolf Services keeps revolving our revenue back into our business we will be able to grow beyond our five-year plan. I feel that we will not sell, even if we generate enough money to retire. Reason being, no one can run this and generate the relationship I have with these customer, some being since day one.  After talking to many different people, much of whom are out there to just survive (which is okay) I feel that our success and knowledge is worth sharing to people that need to put food on the table.
lenders.occupational_info: We here at Uniwolf Services provide a quality washing of vehicles on dealership lots at a price everyone can live with. While in fact the car washes that you drive your car to charge a discounted rate, here at Uniwolf cut that down in order for the dealerships to save even more money. I have three men that go out on days that are the right temperature and not raining to wash, rinse and dry every vehicle that a dealership wants maintained. We have a solid schedule that is done every day of every week.

lenders.name: Helene
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel great! I am so fortunate and I want to share my good fortune and love with others.
lenders.occupational_info: It is a joy!

lenders.name: Alessandria
lenders.loan_because: i believe everyone in the world deserves a chance to succeed in life

lenders.name: Emilie & Link
lenders.loan_because: We have been entrepreneurs, and understand the importance of getting support to start a business. We feel that this is an important way to contribute on a global level and help people to achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Link is a Computer Engineer and Emilie is a Jewellery designer.

lenders.name: Joe, Z, Noah & Katya
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of hard working people.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airplanes for a Major US airline.  I travel all over the world and love to meet new people.

lenders.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate student. Besides that I´m also an entrepreneur working on many personal projects.

lenders.occupational_info: Es un negocio de alquiler de peliculas. necesito un capital inicial para empezar pero no lo tengo entonces acudo a ustedes. este negocio se trata de un alquiler de peliculas y videos, cada semana vamos a comprar y actualizando, para asi realizar mejor nuestro trabajo!

lenders.occupational_info: We are now both retired and are thankful that we can spend time together enjoying our grandchildren, children, friends and family.  We've worked hard our entire lives and are blessed to be able to enjoy the freedom of retirement and each other.
